testcase.name: Verify that user is able to add products to cart when clicking the 'Thêm vào giỏ'button
Verify that product price is displayed correctly in the Cart
Verify that product name is displayed correctly in the cart
Verify that user is able to select the amount of product in the cart
Verify that product price must be greater than 0 in cart
testcase.system-err: null thucydides.cucumber.steps.AddToCartSteps.thePriceMustBeAPositiveNumber(AddToCartSteps.java:109) ✽.The price must be a positive number(src/test/resources/features/addtocart.feature:32)

testcase.name: Verify that product is able to deleted when user clicks the Delete icon
Verify that total amount of the order is displayed correctly with product price of chosen products
